## Current position
Associate Professor of GIScience and Geography at [Panthéon-Sorbonne University](https://geographie.pantheonsorbonne.fr/lufr-geographie), member of the [PRODIG research lab](https://www.prodig.cnrs.fr/). 

## Bio

Robin Cura is an Associate Professor of Geography at Panthéon-Sorbonne University. 
His work focuses on quantitative geography, agent-based modelling and data visualization. With a background in geographic data science and geographic information engineering, he is interested in the development of quantitative methods for the exploration, vizualization and analysis of spatial data.

## Education
